sect1.para: Below is the list of patches applicable to the NetBSD 2.1 release:

itemizedlist.listitem:
A description and resolution procedure for ptrace() permissions after S[UG]ID and exec() can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2005-013

A description and resolution procedure for SO_LINGER argument checking DIAGNOSTIC panic can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2005-012

A description and resolution procedure for ntpd may start with different group id than desired can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2005-011
